sadE.p:

Damn that girl really did love me

I miss the person who thought you were.

if you treat me like an opton
l leave you like a choice

YOU DIDN’T

HAVE FUN

Now I hate you.

A person that truly
loves you will
never let you go,
no matter how
hard the
situation is.

Till my last day,
I’ll be loving you.

but you lost someone who truly loved you.

DON’T FucK WITH MY FEELINGS,
JUST BECAUSE
YOU’RE UNSURE OF YOUR OWN.

I don’t miss you,
I miss the personl thought you were.

When someone leaves,
it’s because Someone elsee is about to arrive.

I don’t care how complicated this gets,
I still want you.

I’m sad but I Smile.
That’s my life.

all-day every day

the things, they do.

fine????

A GIRL BECOMES VERY DANGEROUS…
WHEN SHE LEARN TO CONTROL HER
EMOTIONS AND FEELINGS.

ON HER WEDDING DAY :
“YOU ARE LOOKING BEAUTIFUL”, HE SAID.
HER EYES GOT WET.
AFTER ALL IT WAS THE FIRST
COMPLIMENT FROM HER BROTHER.

Maturity is,
When you’re hurt like hell from inside..
But you still smile as nothing happened.
Rejection

BEHIND A RUDE GIRL
THERE WAS A GIRL WITH SOFT HEART
WHO TRUSTED EVERYONE
ONCE UPON A TIME.

A FEMALE NEVER FORGETS
HOW A MAN TREATS HER DURING
THE TIME SHE NEEDS HIS
SUPPORT THE MOST

THE REAL FACT IS
YOU WILL NEVER KNOW THE POWER
INSIDE YOU
UNLESS OR UNTIL SOMEONE HURTS
YOU BAD

Never be too much available for
someone otherwise your feelings will
be taken for granted.

REPLACING ME IS EASY.
BUT FINDING A VIBE LIKE MINE
IS IMPOSSIBLE.
I ASSURE YOU THAT.

My biggest mistake..
I made someone my priority.. When I was
just an option for that person.

Walk away when it’s done. There’s no
the point in watering a dead flower.

I like the mirror because when I cry
it won’t smile as others do.!

JUST
BECAUSE

WELL,
DOESN’T

irritate
the one who they care
The most

make you happy in the end
its never good e ough because
Talways end up harting

and remembering,
she did the disappearing
and the forgetting

change your heart …

Thank you for breaking my heart,
Because without that I wouldn’t
be the person I am today,,, with the person I love.

It’s very easy to say “Busy”
when someone needs you,
But it’s very painful to hear “Busy”
when you need someone.

Since the day you left me…
I lost Everything because
You are My Everything…

I never stopped loving you,
just stopped showing it

Sometimes you just need to distance yourself from people.
If they care,
They’ll notice.
If they don’t,
you know where you stand.

A BROKEN HEART IS JUST THE
GROWING PAINS NECESSARY
SO THAT YOU CAN LOVE
MORE COMPLETELY WHEN THE
REAL THING COMES ALONG.

One thing I learned in my life,
You can be important to someone
but not all the time.

I wish I could give you
my pain just for one
a moment so you can
Understand how much
you hurt me.

Don’t force someone
to remember you all
the time. Just stay
silent and let them
realize how will they
be without you in
their life.

Walking alone is
not “Difficult..”
But when we
walked a mile with
someone
then. . . . .
Back Alone is
Difficult…

are the hardest to
wipe away.

in hiding that.

Yet you continue to wear it

Snakes don’t hiss anymore
They call you baby, friend, or family

That it never comes from your enemies

But yours is hearting me a lot.

Thinking,I am offline.

Coz nobody Cares.

Oh! away from people.

Nothing hurts more than having
Flashback of all the things that broke you

Smile every day and you believed it.

they have promised a thousand times they won’t.

My heart will find a reason to forgive again.

Back from someone you really won’t to talk.

JUST BECAUSE SOMEONE CARRIES IT
WELL, DOESN’T MEAN IT ISN’T HEAVY.
I hate love because it reminds me of the memories we shared together.
Love gets me out control. That’s the main reason I hate it so much
Of All The Lies You Told Me, I Love You’ Was My Favorite.
I hate you with the exact same measure that I once loved you.
I hate Love and never want to be in love anymore. I don’t want it to happen to me again.
I loved you, yet you tore my heart into shreds. I Hate Love
I recently realized that the opposite of Love is not hatred, but indifference. I hate him, yet I still care.
I don’t hate you because you don’t love me anymore, I only hate myself for still loving you.
Don’t think I’m weak because I’m silent. I just hate fighting with you.
I hate myself for still waiting for you to come back.
I wish my brain has an option to block some thoughts, thoughts of you would have been the first.
I can’t stop loving you, that is the reason I hate you.
Hating me won’t make you pretty! IN FACT not even plastic surgery would help.
I hate you, and you and you too. Now try and figure out who this status is about.

FOR ME,
LOVE AND
FAMILY IS THE
SAME WORD

Family means no one gets
left behind or forgotten…

Unfortunately,
no one notices your tears.
No one notices your sadness.
No one notices your pain.
But family are the one who notice everything.

HAVING SOMEWHERE TO GO IS HOME
HAVING SOMEONE TO LOVE IS FAMILY
HAVING BOTH IS A BLESSINGS

I’d Rather tell A
stranger All of my
problems then tell
A friend/family
member who will
Judge me.

A truly rich man is one whose
Children run into his
Arms when his hands are empty

IT’S SAD WHEN CERTAIN FAMILY
MEMBERS CAUSE NOTHING BUT
TROUBLE IN YOUR LIFE AND THEN
THEY GET MAD WHEN YOU DECIDE TO
CUT THEM OFF COMPLETELY AND
THEN THEY MAKE OUT YOU ARE THE
BAD ONE

THERE IS NO GREATER
BLESSING THAN A FAMILY HAND
THAT LIFTS YOU FROM A FALL;
BUT THERE IS NOT LOWER
**CURSE THAN A FAMILY HAND
THAT STRIKES YOU WHEN
YOU’RE DOWN.

Being
family is
determined
more by
behavior
than blood.

I just know everyone judges
me…everyone; that includes
my family, actually
especially my family.

You should
never sacrifice
three things:
your family,
your heart, or
your dignity

in our family portrait, we look
pretty happy.
we look pretty normal,
let’s go back to that.
in our family portrait, we look pretty happy.
let’s play pretend,
act as it goes naturally.

It is not what you do for your children,
but what you have taught them to do for themselves,
that will make them successful human beings
You Hurt Me But I Still Love You.
True Love Isn’T Found. It’S Built.
